data.text: Jisu'n John neek-ah siamruoi tamwiai baptize amintho tikha Pharisee ngai'n inleijet,
Ka etakchu, baptize kamintho kha Jisu lei-emak takkha asiamruoi ngai in-eii.
Hiwa chonghi Jisu'n aleijet phakhan, Ama'n Judea mathaanna Galilee ah aleikirnook;
halli Samaria ram rakaanli sisik kha alei eii.
Samaria ah Sychar inti khuopui, Jacob in asapa Joseph diang ileipeii leimun koolla aheiwa. Inphut 33:19; Josh 24:32
Jacob tuikhur kha khawakhan aleiom, Jisu'n akasikha aleipoongnga, tuikhur koolla alei in-ong. Kani indingdeng phakhan alei eii.
Samaritan numeisa inkhat tui kachoi aheiwa, khat-um Jisu'n numeisanu diang aleiti, “Keidiang insik-ah tui napero.”
Ajarchu asiamruoi ngaikha khopuiya baksik-ah bakphur karacho inleisi.

Samaritan numeisanu khan aleimasang, “Angjarra Jihudi nang in, Samaritan numeisa keidiang tui insik-ah ninanime?” ajarchu Jihudi ngai chu Samaritan ngai'n inliingna rabing khat-um kheeng inliingnamu.4:9. Jihudi ngai chu Samaritan ngai'n inliingna rabing khat-um kheeng inliingnamu; emakli Jihudi ngai chu Samaritan ngaile inlopnasik iteii arei ommak. Ezra 4:1; Neh 4:1-2

Jisu'n aleimasang, “Nang in Pathian kutchoi kha naleijetngai suok-ah khat-um nangdiang tui insik-ah kanani amahi naleijet inchu, nang in amadiang naleinisik eii, halli ama'n nangdiang ringna tuikha analeipesik eii.”
Numeisanu khan aleiti, “Ocha” “Nangchu tuiluok nasik neimakche, tuikhur hi inthuuk. Hu makheiya khawa ringna tuikha naleisik me?
Hiwa tuikhur kanaleipeii, ama sangai khat-um asadon rakip ngai'n in-in, keini kinpa Jacob neek-ah nalokwiaibe?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “ Hiwa tui ka-in miring rakip khachu woikhat araalpinook sik eii,
Takkha kei'n kapesik tuikha ka-in ama khachu woikhat inlet-ah tuikaraal omnuni. Kei'n amadiang kapesik tui khan amadiang tuiring inchangta kumsoot ringna kha esik eii.”
Numeisanu khan amadiang aleiti “Karu, khawa tuikha keidiang napero! Tichu kei'n woikhat tuikaraal ommaknasik, khat-um woikhat tui kachoi kaheiwa maknasik.”
Jisu'n numeisanu diang aleiti, “Si inlang naruothar juokoiro, halli heikirnook ro.”
Numeisanu in aleimasang, “Kei karuothar ommak.”
Ajarchu nang pasal ra-ngadiang inn naneijei, halli tuun tuunna niompui pasal kha-um nang naruothar emak. Nang in inthiang kha nariljei.”
Numeisanu khan aleimasang, Karu, “Kei'n kamujei nang Pathian chongkachoi na eii.”
“Keini kinpi kinpu ngai'n hiwa chingbung hin Pathian chubei inleitho, takkha nangni Jihudi ngai inchu Jerusalem khankeeng Pathian chubei nithonasik mun ningti.”
Jisu'n numeisanu diang aleiti, “Numeisa, Keidiang ngamnaro, miring ngai'n Pa Pathian kha hiwa chingbung emakli Jerusalem ma chubei inthomaknasik aphakha aheiwasik eii.
Nangni'n ning ijetmak kha chubei ningtho; takkha keini chu kin-ijetkha chubei kintho, ajarchu sanminringna kha Jihudi diangnga inphut kajuo eii.

Takkha aphakha ahongjei khat-um tuun aphakha ejei, inthiangnga chubei katho ngai'n Pa Pathian kha ratha khat-um akadik ah chubei inthosik eii, Pa Pathian khan inmani ka-ang ngai'n chubei inhongtho kha a-entok.
Pathian chu Ratha eii, khat-um amadiang chubei katho ngai'n ratha khat-um akadik ah chubei inthosik eii.”
Numeisanu khan amadiang aleiti, “Kei'n kajet Messiah (Christa tia inkoi) kha ajuosik eii, Ama'n ajuo phakhan, keini diang angrakip kha narilpisik eii.”
Jisu'n numeisanu diang aleimasang, “Nangle inbiak-ah kaom keihi ama kha ka eii.”

Khawapha takkhan asiamruoi ngaikha inheitung, khat-um ama'n numeisanu khale inlei-inbiak inmupha khan asiamruoi ngai'n inleingak, takkha tuteii innum, “Angme nimanuom?” emakli, “Angjarra numeisanu hile thurchi nithome?” tia leirakelmu.
Numeisanu kha atuibeel da-ah, khuopui tiang aleisi, halli mipui ngaidiang aleirilpi,
“Heiwaru, kei ileitho rakip jarra karilwiak miring kha juo-enru. Ama hi Messiah lei-emak niabe?”
Inmani ngai'n khuopui inmathaanna Jisu diang inheiwa.
Khawa phakhan, “Karu, bakphur lekkhat bakro!” tia asiamruoi ngai'n ama kha inleimatheem.
Takkha ama'n inmani diang aleiti, “Nangni ijetmak bakphur kha kei kanei.”
Khawa jarra asiamruoi ngai'n inkhatli khatdiang inlei inti, “Tu miring inkhat in amasik bakphur heikachoipi inombe?”
Jisu'n inmani diang aleiti, “Kei kabu chu” “Kei kanajuotirpa imanuom katho khat-um ama chuon huui kamintung kha eii.
Nangni'n ‘Tha mili esuoli lei rakhoolpha eii timak chuwabe?’ Takkha kei'n nangni diang kanati, khuo thir-inlang leirajei kha enru; lei ngaikha aminjei khat-um lei rakhoolpha ejei!
Lei karakhool mi kha arakhool man achang halli akara kha kumsoot ringna sik-ah akhomchun; ajarchu kawor pa-um karakhool pa-um inrok suomnasik eii.
Chongngil ileiti kha adik, ‘Miring khat in aru awor halli miring inkhat in arakhool.’
Kei'n nangni itho ka-emak chuon munkhan akara karakhool sik-ah kinatir ejei; aleiilaak mi ngai'n chuon inleithojei, halli inmani chuonleitho khan nangni'n ninghoi kha eii.”
“Kei ileitho rakip ama'n atiwiak” iti numeisanu sakhi jarra khawa khopuiya kaom Samaritan mi katamtak in Jisu diang inlei-ngamna.
Samaritan mi ngai'n amadiang inheiwa phakhan, inmanile omsuomrui tia amadiang inleimatheem, halli Jisu'n inmani ngaile khawa munkhan nini aleiom.
Halli ama chongril khan miring katamtak-um ngamna inleineinook.

Halli inmani'n numeisanu diang inleiti, “Tuunchu keini'n kinngamnajei, nang in nati jarra emak, takkha keini kinpum tak-in amadiang kinrangaijei, khat-um keini'n kinjetjei khachu amahi inthiangnga manmasituol kakatanpa kha a-eii.”
Khawa nini thengnga, Jisu'n Galilee ah aleisi.
Ma apumtak in aleiti, “Pathian chongkachoi ngaikha inramtak inchu khoya thomu.” Matt 13:57; Luk 4:24

Khawa jarra ama'n Galilee aheitung phakhan, Galilee mi ngai'n ama kha katha-ah inleidon, ajarchu Jerusalemma rakaanna kahoi khan inmani ngaikha inleisi khat-um ama'n kahoi suungnga ileitho rakip ngaikha inleimu. Jn 2:23
Halli Jisu'n Galilee suungnga Cana inti, ama'n tuikha theibomju aleimin-uolna ramkhan inlet-ah aheiwa. Halli Capernaumma asapa kanapi kalok kalian miring inkhat aleiom. Jn 2:1-11
Ama'n Jisu kha Judea makheiya Galilee ah aheiwa tikha aleijet phakhan, ama'n Jisu diang asiya ajuoti, kasapa najomindam piro tia chubei aleitho, ajarchu ama kha thisik thoa omjei.
Jisu'n amadiang aleiti, “Chuon inlak khat-um ngak kaom ningmu maklaiseng nangni'n ngamnanutun.”
Kalok kalianpa'n Jisu diang aleiti, “Karu, kasapa thima-ah keile inruoiya situi.”
Jisu'n amadiang aleiti, “Sitro; nang nasapa aringsik eii!”
Inn tiang asina lamma ama suok ngai'n intongpuiya, halli nasapa aringjei tia inleitipi.
Ama'n inmani diang aleirakel asapa ihongdam kha phadan angjet chulpha khan me, khat-um inmani'n inleimasang, “Miyanni suun phadan inkhat khan eii ritun khan ama imathaankha.”
Apa khan aleijet khachu khawa phadan khan eii Jisu'n ama diang ileiti, “Nang nasapa aringsik eii.” Halli ma apumtak khat-um ama insuungkhur in inleingamna.
Judea makheiya Galilee ah aheiwasuo thengnga hiwahi Jisu'n woini huuina ileitho chuon inlak kha eii.
